item.description:
RAW celebrates local artists with special showcase events every month. One of our members Tonya aka Dragon was selected to participate in the April showcase. This is a one night event held at a nightclub, not your typical art gallery opening. There will be all kinds of art represented: drawings, photographs, performance, music, fashion, a little something for everyone!

Please buy your ticket through Tonya aka Dragon's profile ($10) and attend the event to help support our member, Tonya Ratz's, art!!!

21 + EVENT  - COCKTAIL ATTIRE  - $10 TICKET

Link to just the show and see all artists showing:
http://www.rawartists.org/boston/marvel/

This is a link to purchase a ticket through Tonya's page
http://www.rawartists.org/boston/marvel/?artist=123841
http://www.rawartists.org/makemeadragon
item.name: Artist Showcase at Rumor in Boston
